import React from 'react' import { Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import { Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' export const SelectedMovie = ({ addToFavourites, removeFromFavourites }) => { const selectedMovie = useSelector((state) => { return state.selectedMovie }) return (
{selectedMovie.Title} {selectedMovie.Plot}
) } export default SelectedMovie
